channel.title: Graphql-Summit on {code that works}

item.title: My talk at GraphQL Summit 2018
item.description:
I had the opportunity to give a talk at GraphQL Summit 2018 about the experience of introducing GraphQL for our Payments API at Braintree. It was well received, as far as I could tell - I received a lot of nice feedback and had great conversations with members of the community.

The slides are available here on SpeakerDeck. I will update this post with links to the video of my talk when it becomes available The video of the talk is available here.

Francesca Guiducci took this photo:

This was the only time I read "java" on the big screen during this conference that was not part of the word "javascript"! Thanks @sdqali #graphqlsummit pic.twitter.com/3zAO5TLdYY

— Francesca Guiducci (@engfragui) November 9, 2018
